careGuide.label: Light High
value: Loves bright light - as much as they can get.

careGuide.label: Water Medium
value: Allow the soil to dry out completely between waterings, but water heavily when the soil becomes dry.

description: Echeverias are lovely succulents that are both low-maintenance and gorgeous. Their beautiful rosette-like patterns, a wide range of colors, and stunning flowers make them one of the most beloved succulents out there - perfect for any Green Space!
This Assorted Echeveria 4-Pack includes four echeverias of varying colors and species.
title: Motley Crew Echeveria Succulents: 4 Pack
